Jx.Notifier.Float

A floating notice area for displaying notices, notices get chrome if the notifier has chrome

Extends: Jx.Notifier

Events

License

Summary
Jx.Notifier.FloatA floating notice area for displaying notices, notices get chrome if the notifier has chrome
Options
chrome
fx{String} the effect to use when showing and hiding the notifier, default is null
width{Integer} the width in pixels of the notifier, default is 250
position{Object} position options to use with Jx.Widget::position for positioning the Notifier
Functions
addAdd a new notice to the notifier

Options

chrome

{Boolean} should the notifier have chromedefault true

fx

{String} the effect to use when showing and hiding the notifier, default is null

width

{Integer} the width in pixels of the notifier, default is 250

position

{Object} position options to use with Jx.Widget::position for positioning the Notifier

Functions

add

add: function(notice)

Add a new notice to the notifier

Parameters

notice{Jx.Notice} the notice to add
position: function(element,
relative,
options)
positions an element relative to another element based on the provided options.
add: function(notice)
Add a new notice to the notifier
